messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for the Monthly Social Pack.
What does the Monthly Social Pack include?
Can you tell me about the Monthly Social Pack offer?
What are the benefits of the Monthly Social Pack?

The Monthly Social Pack offers 2500MB of internet specifically for Facebook and WhatsApp usage for Rs. 80. This package allows you to stay connected on your favorite social platforms for an entire month.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on how to subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack.
How can I subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack?
What's the code to activate the Monthly Social Pack offer?
Tell me how to get the Monthly Social Pack.
You can subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack by dialing *911# from your Telenor GSM Prepaid SIM.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing details on package renewals.
Does the Monthly Social Pack renew automatically?
Will my Monthly Social Pack automatically renew?
The Monthly Social Pack does not renew automatically. You must manually subscribe again once it expires to continue using the services.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package eligibility.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Social Pack?
Can anyone subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack offer?
All Telenor GSM Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Social Pack.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for the Monthly Social Pack Plus.
What does the Monthly Social Pack Plus include?
Can you tell me about the Monthly Social Pack Plus offer?
What are the benefits of the Monthly Social Pack Plus package?

The Monthly Social Pack Plus offers 3,000 MB of internet specifically for Facebook and WhatsApp usage and 1000 SMS for Rs. 85, including taxes. This package is valid for 30 days and allows you to stay connected with friends and family on your favorite social platforms and via SMS for an entire month.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on how to subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack Plus.
How can I subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack Plus?
What's the code to activate the Monthly Social Pack Plus offer?
Tell me how to get the Monthly Social Pack Plus.
You can subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack Plus by dialing *660# from your Telenor GSM Prepaid SIM.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing details on package renewals.
Does the Monthly Social Pack Plus renew automatically?
Will my Monthly Social Pack Plus automatically renew?
The Monthly Social Pack Plus does not renew automatically. You must manually subscribe again once it expires to continue using the services.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package eligibility.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Social Pack Plus package?
Can anyone subscribe to the Monthly Social Pack Plus offer?
All Telenor GSM Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Social Pack Plus package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for the Monthly Social Ultra package.
What does the Monthly Social Ultra package include?
Can you tell me about the Monthly Social Ultra offer?
What are the benefits of the Monthly Social Ultra package?

The Monthly Social Ultra package offers 4,000 MB of internet specifically for Facebook and WhatsApp usage and 1000 SMS for Rs. 104, including taxes. This package allows you to stay connected on your favorite social platforms and via SMS for an entire month.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on how to subscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra package.
How can I subscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra package?
What's the code to activate the Monthly Social Ultra offer?
Tell me how to get the Monthly Social Ultra package.
You can subscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra package by dialing *345*115# from your Telenor GSM Prepaid SIM.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing details on package renewals.
Does the Monthly Social Ultra package renew automatically?
Will my Monthly Social Ultra automatically renew?
The Monthly Social Ultra package does not renew automatically. You must manually subscribe again once it expires to continue using the services.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package eligibility.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Social Ultra package?
Can anyone subscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra offer?
All Telenor GSM Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Social Ultra package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package validity.
How long is the Monthly Social Ultra package valid for?
What is the validity of the Monthly Social Ultra package?
The Monthly Social Ultra package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be informed when the package expires at midnight.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package usage.
What happens if my data finishes before the Monthly Social Ultra package expires?
What are the charges if I run out of data before the Monthly Social Ultra package validity ends?
If your data finishes before the package expires, you will be charged at Rs 1/MB incl. tax until the package expires.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on package subscription.
Can I subscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra package multiple times within its validity period?
Is it possible to resubscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra package before it expires?

Yes, you can subscribe to the Monthly Social Ultra package multiple times within its validity period. However, resources and their validity from multiple subscriptions are independent of each other and will not merge.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on data speed and availability.
What factors can affect the data speed of the Monthly Social Ultra package?
Will my data speed vary with the Monthly Social Ultra package?

Data speed for the Monthly Social Ultra package can vary depending on factors such as your phone, types of URLs accessed, busy hour logistics, network service provider, and your location. Data packages can be availed in 2G/3G/4G network providing areas.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on supplementary packages.
Is there a supplementary package available if I run out of data on the Monthly Social Ultra package?
What can I do if I need more data after using up my Monthly Social Ultra package?

Yes, there is a supplementary package available that provides 300MB for PKR 6. You can activate it by dialing *503#. This supplementary offer can be availed once a month and provides a hedge against accidental standard rate charging.
